name: Product Carousels for Total
author: WPExplorer

sections.description: Transforms the WooCommerce related and upsell columns into carousels for the Total WordPress theme.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘product-carousels-for-total’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the Customizer settings to control how many items display for the related and cross-sell sections as you will want to display more items than the default so that the carousel works as expected. For example if you want to display 4 columns of related products you may want to set the related items to display at least 8 products.
  4. Check your WooCommerce products to make sure the carousels are working.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed Carousel next/prev arrow size.
  • Fixed Carousels not working when using responsive columns.
  • Added Extra check if the product page is already loading the carousel scripts from other theme elements on the page it won’t load the custom scripts from the plugin.
  • Updated Tested up to WordPress version.

1.0

  • First official release

short_description: Transforms the WooCommerce related and upsell columns into carousels for the Total WordPress theme.
description: Transforms the WooCommerce related and upsell columns into carousels for the Total WordPress theme.
